DataElement.preferredName: Body Weight For Age per Length and Sex
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The body weight for age per length and sex for children less than 3 years of age.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Weight Less Than Three Year Age For Age Per Length And Sex
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._The reason of something._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._For each, generally denoting a ratio._The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Less Than Three Year Age For Age Per Length And Sex Weight

It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female.:The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female.
The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.
